OUR MENUS

Banana Bonanza

(Banana + Peanut Butter + Almonds + Dates + Milk of choice)

Dive into a whirlwind of flavor with our best-selling Banana Bonanza Smoothie Drink. Creamy bananas meet the rich nuttiness of peanut butter, accompanied with the natural sweetness of dates, all blended to perfection with creamy milk. This blend is a meal in itself withtrue celebration of taste and texture without the compromise of healthy nutrients to keep you full all-day-long.

Green Machine

(Green Grapes + Spinach + Cucumber + Ice)

Welcome our powerhouse health drink, the "Green Machine." Packed with the goodness of nature's finest greens, including crisp green grapes, nutrient-rich spinach, and refreshing cucumber. Served over ice for a refreshing chill to deliver a burst of freshness and essential nutrients to fuel your day.

Blueberry Burst

(Blueberry + Banana + Apple + blue spirulina )

Savor the goodness of nature with our "Blueberry Burst" smoothie, crafted with succulent blueberries, ripe bananas, crisp apples, and a boost of superfood blue spirulina. This vibrant blue blend not only tantalizes your taste buds but also nourishes your body with antioxidants and essential nutrients.

Berry Christmas

(Strawberry + Blueberry + Mulberry + banana + Milk)

Our Berry Christmas smoothie is a burst of festivity in advance with a tantalizing blend of vibrant strawberries, plump blueberries, and exotic mulberries, harmoniously fused with creamy banana and milk. Embark on a journey of flavor with this antioxidant-rich concoction, delivering a burst of freshness in every sip.

Heart Beat

(Apple, beetroot, orange, carrot and ice)

Nourish your body and invigorate your senses with our revitalizing health drink, "Heart Beat." Crafted with a blend of crisp apples, earthy beetroot, zesty oranges, and sweet carrots, each sip is a tsunami of flavors packed with essential nutrients. Served over ice for a refreshing chill, this vibrant booster will get your heart pumping with vitality and wellness.

Choco-mate

(Banana + Cacao Powder + Oats + Dates + Milk)

Your favourite chocolate flavor is now available in a guilt free smoothie with our delectable blend of creamy banana, rich sugarfree cacao powder, wholesome oats, sweet dates, and velvety milk. Savour the gut-friendly fibres of oats along with chocolatey goodness in every sip, as the smooth texture and heavenly flavors dance on your palate.

Ma-Papa Smoothie Drink

( Mango + Papaya + Honey + Milk)

Indulge in a taste of the unconditional love with our Ma-Papa Smoothie Drink where an unconventional combination of ripe mangoes and succulent papaya come together in perfect harmony, complemented by a drizzle of golden honey and blended with creamy milk. Each sip is a tropical escape, brimming with natural sweetness and nourishing goodness.

Pink Ban-Dra Smoothie Drink

(Banana + Dragon Fruit + Cranberry + Pitaya Powder + Milk)

Our local Bandra has come with a crazy twist of flavours and colours as we bring together the creaminess of bananas with the exotic allure of dragonfruit , balanced with tart sweetness of cranberries blended in perfection with nourishing milk in our rich pink smoothie drink. This vibrant pink smoothie is not just visually stunning but also a delightful fusion of tropical flavours.

Planet Pandora Smoothie Drink

(Papaya + Cashew + Blue spirulina + Cashewnuts + Milk)

Step into a world of vibrancy with our Planet Pandora Smoothie Drink. Ripe papaya and creamy cashews form the base of this celestial concoction, while the addition of exotic blue spirulina adds a mesmerizing hue that evokes the mysteries of distant galaxies. Blended with creamy milk and topped with crunchy cashew nuts, each sip is a journey through the cosmos, bursting with flavor and nourishment.

Chicoo Chocoo

(Chicoo + Cacao Powder + Cashew + banana + Dates + Milk of Choice)

Your delightfully Chocolate flavour get a healthy twist in our chicoo chocoo smoothie bowl where creamy chicoo pairs perfectly with unsweetened cacao powder, creating a decadent base enriched with antioxidants and natural sweetness. Topped with luscious banana slices, crunchy cashews, and sweet dates, each spoonful is a symphony of flavors and textures. Finished with a drizzle of your choice of milk, this nourishing bowl is the ultimate treat for both your taste buds and your well-being.

Mango Smurf

(Mango, Banana, Blue Spirulina, Milk)

Get lost in the enchanting world of our seasonal delight, the "Mango Smurf" blue smoothie bowl. Crafted with ripe mangoes, creamy bananas, and a touch of superfood blue spirulina, all blended to perfection with your choice of milk. Indulge in the vibrant hues and tropical flavors of this magical creation, guaranteed to transport your taste buds to blue skies and sunny shores.

Yellow Yoga

(Mango + Pineapple + Banana + Milk)

Indulge in our revitalizing "Yellow Yoga" smoothie, a harmonious blend of ripe mangoes, tangy pineapples, and creamy bananas, fused with the velvety richness of milk. Energize your day with this tropical delight, brimming with vitamins and flavors unlike you ever savoured before.

Banana Peanut Butter Smoothie Bowl

To all the gymoholic rats who love banana and simply can’t resist spoonful of peanut butter daily, here is a simple blend of fibre rich banana with the creamier unsweetened peanut butter with your choice of milk, nuts and seeds makes it an unapologetic favourite. It’s thick consistency and rich flavours are surely going to fill your tummy for long.

Yellow Fever Smoothie Bowl

Experience the vibrant burst of tropical flavors with our Yellow Fever Smoothie Bowl. A tantalizing blend of ripe mangoes, creamy bananas, crisp apples, and succulent papaya creates a luscious base that transports you to sun-soaked shores with every spoonful. Choose your favorite milk to achieve the perfect creamy consistency, then top it off with a sprinkle of seeds and nuts of your choice for added crunch and nutrition

Deadly Dragonfruit Smoothie Bowl

Dragonfruit Smoothie Bowl. Vibrant pink dragonfruit takes center stage, complemented by creamy bananas and crisp apples, all blended to perfection with your choice of milk. Customize your bowl with a selection of nuts and seeds to add a satisfying crunch and boost of nutrition. Indulge in this vibrant and refreshing creation that will invigorate your senses and tantalize your taste buds with every spoonful

Piña-Colada Smoothie Bowl

Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with our Piña-Colada Smoothie Bowl. A harmonious blend of creamy bananas, tangy pineapple, and luscious coconut meat, sweetened with a touch of honey and coconut water. Customize your bowl with your choice of milk for added creaminess, and top it off with a selection of nuts and seeds for a satisfying crunch. Dive into the refreshing flavors of the Caribbean and let this exotic bowl whisk you away

Crazy Coconut Vanilla Smoothie Bowl

Get ready for a taste sensation with our Crazy Coconut Vanilla Smoothie Bowl. Creamy coconut flesh and ripe bananas come together in perfect harmony, blended with luscious coconut milk and a hint of aromatic vanilla essence. Dive into this tropical delight, bursting with rich coconut flavor and a touch of sweet vanilla. Topped with your favorite toppings for added texture and crunch, it's the perfect way to start your day or indulge in a guilt-free treat.

CBerry Berry Good Smoothie Bowl

Embark on a berrylicious journey with our Berry Berry Good Smoothie Bowl. Bursting with the natural sweetness of ripe bananas and a delightful mix of mixed berries including succulent strawberries, exotic mulberries, and plump blueberries, this bowl is a true celebration of berry goodness. Customize your creation with your choice of milk for the perfect creamy consistency, and top it off with a selection of nuts and seeds for added texture and nutrition.

Kiwi Kiss

(kiwi + pineapple + Green Grapes)

This delightful blend features the exotic tang of kiwi, the sweet juiciness of pineapple, and the crisp bite of green grapes. Each sip is a journey to paradise, offering a refreshing escape from the ordinary.

Tropical Twist

(Pineapple + Orange + Ice + Mint )

Dive into a refreshing blend of juicy pineapple, tangy orange, and crisp mint, all served over a bed of ice for the ultimate cool-down experience. This vibrant concoction is like a vacation in a glass.

Kyu Cumber?

( Cucumber, Orange, Lime, Ice)

Beat the heat in style with our invigorating summer cooler ‘Kyu Cumber?’ fusion of cool cucumber, Zingy Orange and lusty lime. Delight in the crispness of cucumber complemented by the citrusy zest, making every sip a rejuvenating experience.

Grape Escape

(Green grapes, Black Grapes, Ice )

Embark on a summer-scape with our signature cooler called the "Grape Escape." So come dive into a refreshing blend of crisp green grapes and luscious black grapes, served over ice to deliver a burst of coolness with every sip. Embark on a journey of grape-infused delight and let this invigorating concoction transport you to a world of pure refreshment.

B-Granade

( Strawberry+ Pomegranate + Ice)

Explode your taste-buds with our scintillating cooler, the "B-granade." Bursting with the explosive flavors of ripe strawberries and tangy pomegranate, served over ice for an extra chill. Dive into a symphony of fruity goodness that will tantalize your taste buds and leave you feeling refreshed and revitalized.

Sunrise Sunset

(Pineapple, Pomegrante, ginger, Ice in two separate layers)

Introducing our dual-layered thirst quencher, the "Sunrise and Sunset" cooler, a harmonious fusion of tropical flavors and refreshing zest. In the Sunrise layer, savor the sweet tang of pineapple, while the Sunset layer awakens your senses with the burst of juicy pomegranate. Each layer is meticulously crafted to perfection with a kick of ginger and served over ice for an extra chill.

Melon Explosion

(Watermelon + strawberry+ Lemon Juice + Mint)

Savor the taste of summer with our "Melon Explosion" cooler, a refreshing blend of sweet watermelon, succulent strawberries, zesty lemon juice, and a hint of cool mint. This invigorating concoction is the perfect antidote to scorching summer days.

Mango Tango

(Mango + Orange + Ice)

Introducing our exclusive"Mango Tango" summer cooler, a tantalizing fusion of ripe mango and zesty orange, served over a refreshing bed of ice. Dive into a symphony of tropical flavors as you sip on this delightful concoction, perfectly crafted to beat the summer heat.
